meanings.definition: A large group or number of things.
meanings.sent1: The arrays of students in the school auditorium were excited for the assembly.
meanings.sent2: There were arrays of delicious food at the buffet, tempting everyone's taste buds.
meanings.sent3: The arrays of colorful balloons at the party created a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The forest was an array of different trees, each standing tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The arrays of toys in the store delighted the children, who couldn't decide what to choose.
